svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Figure illustrates military expenditure per capita. Military expenditure (in current USD) has been divided by the total
Source: Our World in Data based on COW & SIPRI (2018)
